dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: I feel a presence in the Force.

dialogue.speaker: Darth Vader
dialogue.text: The boy is strong, but untrained. I will turn him to the dark side.

dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: No! That's not true. My father would never do such a thing!

dialogue.speaker: Darth Vader
dialogue.text: Ah, the boy's anger is growing. It won't be long before he joins me.
